basics.name: Jeremiah Dy
basics.label: University Graduate
basics.summary: I am a recent B.S. Computer Science graduate of the University of Hawai'i at MƒÅnoa, class of 2024. I am currently looking for a entry-level software engineering position. Thanks for stopping by!

education.area: Computer Science, Honors: summa cum laude

work.summary: Computer science intern primarily focused on developing C-based and Python scripts
highlights: Utilized AFSIM software to create extensible models and simulation output data
Developed Python scripts to run large design of experiments
Applied genetic algorithm concepts to iteratively construct higher-scoring experiment simulations
Deployed a high-performance computing cluster to run large jobs in parallel
Leveraged GitLab to manage version control and software development lifecycle
Promoted from previous Shift Leader position
Teached new employees the basic recipes and skills

work.summary: Grader and TA for MATH 307 (Linear Algebra & Differential Equations)
highlights: Grading student assignments and providing feedback
One-on-one meetings with students as requested

volunteer.summary: Occasional volunteer at food distribution events across O'ahu
highlights: Sort, pack, and offload food to families that drive-by
Volunteered at multiple location over volunteer history
Most frequented distribution sites: Lighthouse Outreach-Waiphu and King's Chapel Outreach-Hawai'i Kai

awards.title: Regents Scholarship
awards.summary: A four-year tuition waver scholarship awarded to incoming high-achieving freshmen with semesterly payments of ~$6,000 over eight semesters.
